AI Description: p11-kit is a library to manage PKCS#11 modules. It enables multiple applications to use the same PKCS#11 module in parallel, ensures that applications get access to the same serialized view of the module's state, and handles sharing access to the module state among applications.
Core Features: Manages Pkcs#11 Modules, Enables Multiple Applications To Use The Same Module, Provides A Serialized View Of The Module'S State, Handles Sharing Access To The Module State Among Applications
